title: Jason Schreier Leaves Kotaku - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.16.20
description:
The No. 1 Games Journalist (sorry Andy) has left his post. What does Jason Schreier leaving mean for Kotaku and the gaming press? Blessing and Greg discuss! 

Time Stamps - 
  00:04:00 - Housekeeping 
 TLOU STREAM TODAY
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:08 - JASON SCHREIER LEAVES KOTAKU
00:22:00 - With Jason Schreier announcing his departure from Kotaku where do you think Jason goes next? - Best Friends Q:The 5 Star Man
00:30:30 - PS5 Consoles to be Limited, Ta-ka-shi Mochi-zu-ki and Yuki Fu-ru-kawa @ Bloomberg
00:45:32 - FOLLOW-UPS
00:45:00 - Do people reasonably think that the current switch can handle ray tracing? - Best Friends Q:Borzen00
00:58:00 - Out today
 - Squad Up: RobbyRob (Stadia (it lives)) RobbyRob#4566
 - You‘re Wrong
01:07:05 - Post Show 
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Greg
